solution_line_template: Colton gave away {stickers_per_friend} stickers * {num_friends} friends = <<{stickers_per_friend}*{num_friends}={stickers_given_to_friends}>>{stickers_given_to_friends} stickers.

In total, Colton gave away {stickers_given_to_friends} + {stickers_given_to_mandy} + {stickers_given_to_justin} stickers = <<{stickers_given_to_friends}+{stickers_given_to_mandy}+{stickers_given_to_justin}={total_given}>>{total_given} stickers.
Colton's number of total stickers at the end is {initial_stickers} - {total_given} = <<{initial_stickers}-{total_given}={stickers_left}>>{stickers_left} stickers.
